title: Superbugs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/4/19
itunes:title: Superbugs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/4/19
description:
George Noory and Dr. Matt McCarthy of New York Presbyterian Hospital explore the rise of new antibiotic resistant superbugs and infections, if there are any natural cures to fight off diseases, and how to deal with families that refuse to immunize their children.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An examination into the growth of superbugs and infections that threaten human health.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
